title: Low Priority queue timer resetting
body: Playing binding of isaac while i wait for my low priority queue timer and every 10 minutes or so the timer resets to full (i have a 20 minute timer). Why exactly is it doing this?

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa so that's not supposed to happen. Could you possibly shoot me a quick screenshot or video showing where it resets as well as the total time spent in queue over on the right?
help please this is happening to my account right now, it keeps resetting, i would like to play without having to wait 40 minutes or maybe even more because the timer keeps resetting while im waiting

If you can shoot us a screenshot of where that timer is resetting we should be able to do something, but it's hard to tell whether it's bugging and resetting or some kind of weird connection issue without being able to see it =(

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iHXGykXO,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-20T21:07:31.756+0000)
>
> If you can shoot us a screenshot of where that timer is resetting we should be able to do something, but it's hard to tell whether it's bugging and resetting or some kind of weird connection issue without being able to see it =(

https://snag.gy/8pjMUy.jpg

Yeeeaaa that definitely looks like it bugged out. Go ahead and shoot this over to our techs so they can take a look at some of your game and network logs to see what might be causing that, and after some troubleshooting, they should be able to get everything taken care of!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iHXGykXO,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-21T01:03:02.108+0000)
>
> Yeeeaaa that definitely looks like it bugged out. Go ahead and shoot this over to our techs so they can take a look at some of your game and network logs to see what might be causing that, and after some troubleshooting, they should be able to get everything taken care of!

if it helps, i had this issue when i was in low priority queue, and noticed it happened if i was tabbed out watching a youtube video, the instant the video ends, the timer in game resets
You can reach them through submitting a ticket here-> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iHXGykXO,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-20T21:07:31.756+0000)
>
> If you can shoot us a screenshot of where that timer is resetting we should be able to do something, but it's hard to tell whether it's bugging and resetting or some kind of weird connection issue without being able to see it =(

where can i "shoot you" a screenshot?

Happening to me too... Here's a screenshot https://snag.gy/nVQIHF.jpg
Been in queue for almost 50 minutes now

Looks like you might be having the same kind of issues. First make sure it's not connection related (which is usually the case for LPQ resets) by checking off the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Once you've ruled out connection issues, shoot that screenshot over to the techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as Sir did!

This is happening to me right now, for some reason i had to leave a game or 2 and now i have 20minutes low priority, but it has reset while im wating from 10 back to 20 minutes and i have to start over. I have been waiting for 40 minutes now and starting to give up on even playing

I haven't played this game in about 8 months or so, just because I got placed in low priority queue after a few mid-game power outages. Every time I'm reminded I need to wait 20 minutes to even start looking for a match, I log out because.....aint nobody got time for that....can I pay for a reset or something so I can get a casual match in every once in a while without having to wait half my lunch break to get out of the queue?

Hi. 
I am using LOL on imac. 
I have been kicked out of in the middle of the game and was never be able to get back into the game for few times. 

As a result I have low priority queue that I have to wait for 9 mins everytime i try to play ranked.

Is there any way I can prove that i didnt leave on purpose or have it gone?

Thank you
i have the same problem
Bwahahahahahahaha. Fuck this stupid game. Ain't nobody got time for this.
same it too happened with me
Sometimes i get low Q because life happens, but this always happens i don't mind  but im in a q with multiple people this time http://prntscr.com/i9ugzg
i am having the same issue.  I'm in the low priority queue because after, updating my AMD driver, i only get a black screen once i get in game, starting at the loading screen.
Yea same thing for me been in q for about 80 mins now xD
happening to me as well its done this 6 times now

same thing is happening to me please help
https://files.acrobat.com/a/preview/45b38faa-3729-40d4-8967-e3cdb771f2c2
Just heading into a game I did leave the queue at 16 minutes into the lpq and then instantly start it again but it still reset after 5-10 minutes[](https://gyazo.com/aec52dc367af62d9f14ba6f3a3491cfc)
https://gyazo.com/0c145664c8075e69c21818e6915ef8cc ;D same

The account this is happening on is called DemiGodOfTetris. I bought a champion after a normal game. Which i queued into on low priority, which had no resets.

I'm 21 minutes of waiting into it. Had to leave to bring someone to the hospital two days ago. Been low priority for 8 games now, (this is a guess, i don't want to leave the queue to check). This is the first time it's been doing this. But also the first time i'm playing AR URF SNOW. I saw it reset around 3 minutes once, but the timer doesn't add up to have been doing that all the time. Riot please.

Did i even want to play? https://snag.gy/MVKtga.jpg (At exactly 4 minutes left)

Yeah same happened to me while trying to duo with a friend. He had low priority and his queue reset like 3 times. After waiting for a total of 35 minutes we just decided to play something else instead.
